title: The Adventure of the Hero “Aaahn” - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Demon Lord   Game Elements   Heroes   Male Protagonist   Oneshot
author: 青水龍
description:
His name was Aaahn. He's a hero.

Of course, he wasn't the one who gave himself that name which sounded like a moan. The player who controlled him jokingly gave him that disgusting name. He definitely would never name himself with a moaning sound…

And this is the story of the adventure of the hero “Aaahn”.>
